about_the_game:
Embark on a new Epic Adventure in the World of Talisman

Are you ready to experience Talisman like never before in Talisman: Digital 5th Edition? Play the digital adaptation of the newest version of the iconic board game, reimagined with stunning new art, streamlined rules, and a sleek, modern design.

What is Talisman?

Talisman is a fantasy-themed adventure board game, first released in 1983, where you can take on the role of various adventurers, from warriors and wizards, to thieves and ghouls, each with their own strengths and unique abilities. You’ll race against other bold adventurers to reach the centre of the board first, with the danger ramping up as you get closer and closer.

You’ll fight strong enemies, gain valuable treasure, cast awesome spells, and encounter mysterious strangers on your journey. You’ll need a good mixture of luck and strategy, and to balance risk and reward if you want to emerge the victor!

What's New in Talisman: Digital 5th Edition?

In Talisman: Digital 5th Edition, the eleventh era has just dawned - the three Great Gods who originally created the Crown of Command have faded into myth. The time is over for the Wizard who returned to life the broken realm in the last era. A new champion must rise to claim the Crown and rule the world in the era to come. Will you be that champion?

  • Fresh Artwork: Immerse yourself in a visually captivating world with brand-new, parallax illustrations that breathe life into every corner of the game board.

  • Revamped Rules: Experience Talisman with updated rules that streamline gameplay, enhance strategic depth, and ensure a more balanced and engaging experience for players both old and new.

  • Modern Design: Enjoy a sleek and intuitive interface designed for seamless navigation and effortless immersion, whether you're playing solo or competing with friends online.

  • Remastered Classic Expansions: Starting with The Reaper, we’re bringing your 4th Edition expansions across to 5th Edition, free for anyone who owns the original expansions in Talisman: Digital Classic Edition!

Key Features:

  • Solo or Multiplayer: Play alone against AI opponents or gather your friends for epic multiplayer battles, online or locally.

  • Expansive Content: Choose from a vast array of characters, each with their own unique abilities, and explore a richly detailed world filled with countless adventures and challenges.

  • Customizable Experience: Tailor your gameplay experience with the new Deck Editor, various house rules and more ways to customise your Talisman adventure.

Join the Adventure Today

Whether you're a seasoned Talisman veteran or a newcomer to the world of fantasy board games, Talisman: Digital 5th Edition will offer an unforgettable journey filled with magic, mystery, and endless possibilities. Are you ready to claim the Crown of Command once and for all? Or will you be turned into a toad again?

name: Talisman: Digital 5th Edition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.0GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 6 GB VRAM, AMD Radeon RX 580 / Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Are you ready to enter a new era of Talisman? Discover a world where every roll of the dice can lead to a new adventure in this digital adaptation of the latest edition of the iconic and beloved fantasy adventure board game.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish
